text: Ralf Schumacher (born 30 June 1975) is a retired German Formula one driver. He was born in Hürth, North Rhine-Westphalia and is the younger brother of Michael Schumacher. He drove for Jordan, Williams and Toyota. ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== Season Series Team Races Poles Wins Points Position 1992 Formula BMW Junior ? 10 ? ? 66 6th 1993 Formula BMW Junior ? ?
